title: Riot please what is this.

CrimsonPvP: rank?
CrimsonPvP: oh gold  3
CrimsonPvP: easy to skip to gold 3
CrimsonPvP: I skipped bronze and silver in a week
CrimsonPvP: ggwp


Like wtf is wrong with riot. I reported teams for trolling maybe I am a bit toxic but you can't deny that they're trolling. I even got a TY from riot for reporting this people so why do I get a chat restriction. I get more honor than reports so why I get chat restricition.

replies.body:
And now I have honor 1 seems legit. While I was close to 3.

I'm never flaming for nothing only if someone makes me tilted by being toxic.

Players who blame you for losing the game while they're feeding way more that is what makes me mad and toxic.

Toxic isn't as bad as feeding or making people tilt on purpose so why do you chat restrict people who wanna be interactive with the team but sometimes it doesn't work out.
Because someones feeding doesn't mean you get to be toxic.
lol, you have no idea if you were close to 3 or not. There's no way to tell that.

You literally attack all 4 other members of your team every game that's posted on here. For your one enjoyment you are causing grief to 4 other people at the very least. How do you figure that it's somehow ok for 4 others to have a bad time because of one person's attitude? The solution is simple -- get rid of the 1 that's causing the problem which unfortunately is you.

You also seem to have a bad case of the "I'm not doing well therefore it must be everyone else's fault." I'd wager you don't play perfectly every game yet at no point do you say "sorry guys I messed this one up"

Emmm you're actually the most stupid person I've ever heard. You say 'you literly attack all 4 other memebers of your team that's posted on here' yeah pretty obvious it were the 3 that gave me the punishment? Also you say they're having a bad time. One of the games was a game was a game I was carrying but my team or at least my jgl and mid lane were feeding hard and were blaming me for it I wasn't flaming untill then because I thought we would win but they started annoying me cause they were the one making mistakes and they were flaming me for their own mistakes. I don't blame my teammates for my mistakes. But if you have a Camille support that doesn't even come to lane with you against an actual good support who PEELS adc it makes a huge difference. What can I do say it's my fault that I got dived because we got no vision or I get no peel from the support. Counterganks don't exist and they don't like to teamplay. I don't deny that I make a lot of misstakes but I try to play as a team as much as possible. I never denied that I wasn't toxic either but I don't deserve to get restricted from chat for 3 bad games while another 100 were helpful and friendly.

> CrimsonPvP: well you can't report me for anything at all

You lied to them! Not cool man...
I didn't I wasn't flaming before that.

> CrimsonPvP: idiot
CrimsonPvP: I can't do shit
CrimsonPvP: you know
CrimsonPvP: why the fuk does she pick trist mid
CrimsonPvP: report mid for troll pick
CrimsonPvP: report ashe flame
CrimsonPvP: report my team for flame

you did ask for reports. That's harassment.
So you can't deny that they were flaming too? You clearly see everyone was flaming me.
I won't deny but let's not get sidetracked by irrelevant stuff.

Others chat has nothing to do with yours. So it doesn't matter who was toxic more or who started it. Others flaming doesn't mean you get a free-paas to flame as well.

Mute, Report, And go on. No need for more drama than there already is.
wow, you are a real asshole to everyone you play with. Punishment deserved.
If you think I'm an asshole think so but I don't believe you don't flame. Everyone has their bad times and i you don't wanna say it you're a real pssy. Sorry for being rude.

> [{quoted}](name=CrimsonPvP,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=otyXeNTa,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2017-07-06T13:10:40.099+0000)
>
>  but I don't believe you don't flame.

I used to flame a lot. Stopped it because...well.....it's a waste of time and energy. I'm always silent in games, even when I'm being flamed. I just stopped caring about what other people have to say. I noticed that I win a lot more games now too because I'm always 100% focused on winning.
Ok gj dude. Hope you stay like that and have a fun time on the rift.
Play more, chat less.

> I reported teams for trolling maybe I am a bit toxic but you can't deny that they're trolling. I even got a TY from riot for reporting this people 

" I saw someone stealing so I shot him in the head and I reported him to the police, why do I get jailed ? "

The fact they were trolling or being toxic doesnt allow you to be toxic as well. Stay calm,  juste report them at the end and everything will be fine. I you starts being toxic as well, you get punished as well. That's how justice works.
Justice are you playing in a movie or something no one uses that word at all. But ty for your comment and I'll rememeber it. Have a fun time on the rift.

I always enjoy seeing ban chat logs where someone is begging for reports.

Begging for reports is pointless use of chat, since 1 report is the same as 9.

> Riot please what is this?

By the looks of it, it's a chatlog. Presumably presented with a punishment.

> Like wtf is wrong with Riot.

Nothing that has to do with this.

>  I reported teams for trolling maybe I am a bit toxic

Not maybe. You were, so you get punished. Not a hard concept. In reality, what you think doesn't matter. Maybe you don't think this is toxic, but Riot does, and they make the rules, and you accepted those rules.

> but you can't deny that they're trolling.

If I saw the replay I probably could deny it. Even if I couldn't you still don't have the rights to flame.


> I even got a TY from riot for reporting this people so why do I get a chat restriction.

Just because some people are assholes, doesn't mean you have to the right to be one aswell.

> I get more honor than reports so why I get chat restricition.

Because you flamed. Your honor has nothing to do with it.

---

> And now I have honor 1 seems legit. While I was close to 3.

You wouldn't know if you were close to 3. ATM, im not even sure if anyone has gotten level 3.

> I'm never flaming for nothing only if someone makes me tilted by being toxic.

That's not how it should go. It should just be: "I'm never flaming". If you live by that, then you'll wont get punished.

> Players who blame you for losing the game while they're feeding way more that is what makes me mad and toxic.

If they make you mad then mute and report them. By arguing you're just as bad as those you are arguing with.

> Toxic isn't as bad as feeding or making people tilt on purpose so why do you chat restrict people who wanna be interactive with the team but sometimes it doesn't work out.

Just because you are interacting with your team it doesn't mean you'll get punished. If you flame, you'll get punished. 

---

Punishment deserved. 

If you have other question feel free to ask.

Lol the fact I can only press understand is so sad. Because 90% doesn't and wants to report it to riot.

Also it's a robot that automaticly chat restricts you riot doesn't even look at what you've actually done. That's really sad.

So what 3 games toxic isn't rly fair to get no rewards anymore. Also boosting should be illegal because haveing bronzies who admite they were boosted is annoying.

Most of the time I'm nice and helpful do I get rewards for that? 

No I guess not cause riot doesn't give a shit. Trolls don't get banned only the ones that are famous and actually good like the sined main who had a positive win rate. Doesn't seem fair to me at all. Just for talking some shit I get chat restricted. Who the hell actually cares you can mute if you don't like flamers don't you?
